title: What Does the 🙏 Praying Hands Emoji Mean?

steps.title: Praying.
steps.content: Praying. A 🙏 is most commonly known as a religious symbol. It is a sign of hope and spirituality. Someone may use this emoji after sending well wishes or talking about their religious beliefs. [1] X Research source “We are praying for a fast recovery 🙏💕” “Can’t wait for Sunday’s service! ✝️🙏”

steps.title: Gratitude.
steps.content: Gratitude. A 🙏 may be added to a thankful message to show appreciation. This symbol of hope says “please” or “thank you” in Japanese culture or “namaste” in Indian cultures. Because of this, 🙏 can be used when expressing everyday gratitude. [2] X Research source “Beyond thankful for these guys 🥰🙏” “Blessed to have this view for morning yoga 🧘🙏🌳”

steps.title: A high-five.
steps.content: A high-five. Your friend may send you a 🙏 when they’re proud of you. Since they’re not with you IRL, they can give you a virtual high-five. This usage is up for debate. Some people argue that the emoji shows two different people’s hands coming together for a high-five, while others believe they’re one person’s hands held together in prayer. “Proud of you dude 🙏” “We’re in this together! 🙏”

steps.title: A friendly greeting.
steps.content: A friendly greeting. In Japanese culture, a 🙏 can represent a polite “ hello ” or “goodbye.” This emoji symbolizes the act of bowing when meeting or leaving. “It’s so great to virtually meet you 🙏😃” “Have a good day! 😊🙏”

steps.title: When you’re praying:
steps.content: When you’re praying: If you’re sending an encouraging message or hopeful wishes, add a 🙏 to the end of your message. This shows that you’re praying or hoping for the best outcome. You can also use the 🙏 in this context when talking about religion. “I can’t believe this happened. It’s devastating 🙏💔” “I’m praying for you and your family. God will help guide you 💖🙏”

steps.title: When you’re grateful:
steps.content: When you’re grateful: Use a 🙏 when you’re showing appreciation or thanks. Maybe you're expressing gratitude for a friend, teacher, or relative. Add a 🙏 to your message to emphasize positive feelings. “Don’t know where I’d be without these guys ❤️🙏” “So thankful for the Class of 2021 🙏🎓🎉”

steps.title: When you would give someone a high-five IRL:
steps.content: When you would give someone a high-five IRL: Encourage a friend with a virtual high-five when they’re feeling low. The hand-slapping gesture can put anyone in a good mood, so use the 🙏 to send along some positive vibes! Throw it into a conversation where you would give out a high-five in real life. [3] X Research source “That’s epic! Give me five, bro! 😆🙏” “This is fantastic 🙏”

steps.title: When you’re greeting someone:
steps.content: When you’re greeting someone: Send a 🙏 as a polite hello or even a goodbye. The praying hands emoji is a representation of a traditional Japanese greeting. Use this emoji to set a good impression and spread a little positivity. “Hi! My name’s Sally. It’s so nice to meet you 😊🙏” “I hope you have a great weekend 😄🙏”
